headline: APA Corp (APA) Reports Q2 2025: Improved Permian Efficiency and Steady Dividend Payouts
summary: APA Corporation (NASDAQ:APA) is a Texas-based energy company that explores, develops, and sells natural gas, crude oil, and natural gas liquids. It operates oil and gas projects in the United States, Egypt, and the North Sea. During the second quarter of 2025, APA started cutting its Permian rig count from eight to six, showing improvements […]
